Row.Text: Our people now write your sacred icons and only wear purple clothing. I am worried the rest of the world will soon yield to the eerie ways of your empire.

Henceforth, all those born to the reigning Basileus shall be given the title "Porphyrogennetos" - "Born in the Purple". Tzykanion Tournament
One of our generals has proposed to host a Tzykanion Tournament - a game of Sassanid polo - and has asked that we participate as the good and in-touch emperor that we are.[NEWLINE]
I'll have no part in this wreckless activity!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
We have told our general to stop acting like a fool with his games.
We shall take part and we shall be victorious!

Unfortunately, our taking part in the Tzykanion Tournament has resulted in a horrible injury. We shall be bed-ridden for weeks!
{1_LeaderName} of Byzantium has been seriously injured in a game of polo.
The Alexiad

To our surprise, our daughter has secretly been recording our entire reign in what she calls 'The Alexiad.' She has coloured our reign fairly, with both positive and negative attributes recorded, but she has also displayed a bold characterization of women in the empire as noble and brave. If such a thing were to come to the attention of our court, our daughter might have to face great ridicule, and then we might have to deal with her "emotions!"
Burn the thing. Burn the girl whilst we're at it.
